vignette.name: Zero Package Overview
vignette.p: The Zero package is a collection of objects for Zero Configuration Networking also known as ZeroConf or Bonjour. It allows you to find network services and resolve their addresses automatically as well as publish your own network services. This pairs nicely with the standard Max objects udpsend and udpreceive.

ul.li: zero.announce - Publish information about a network service for others to find.
zero.browse - Search for existing network services.
zero.resolve - Return the address information for a named network service.
